hudson.plugins.python.Python.command:
#/usr/bin/python # ======================================================== # Generate jenkins Job for all given Servers # ========================================================
from jenkinsapi.jenkins import * from jenkinsapi.job import * import os.path import urllib2 import os import re
tmpStringArray = os.environ['Servers_List'].split(',')
s = " \t a string example\t "
print s
s = s.strip()
print s
String ServerNamesTrimmed = re.sub('[\s+]', '', tmpStringArray)
#ServerNames = tmpStringArray.strip()
for server in ServerNamesTrimmed: print (server)
